champ_0140_rival_02:
It’s finally time for your last Gym, right? I heard
from Rika![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0140_rival_03:
But I’m zero percent worried about you. I know
you got this![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0140_rival_04:
Even La Primera seems like she wants to keep
an eye on you...[VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0140_rival_05:
Maybe I’ll go find her so we can cheer you on
together when you battle the Gym Leader![VAR 0114(0004)]
champ_0140_rival_06:
So go have a battle that’s fruitful for you AND
for the crowd![VAR 0114(0004)]
